-- 从 once_fill 表中获取记录 SELECT 'once_fill' AS source_table, o.id, NULL AS at_id, -- 显示at_id为空 o.name as name, o.model , o.quantity , o.unit_price as unitPrice, o.quantity * o.unit_price as totalAmount, o.time AS record_date, o.apply_remark, c.title AS category_title FROM once_fill AS o JOIN categories AS c ON o.apply_remark LIKE CONCAT('%', c.title, '%') WHERE c.title = #{categoryName} -- 分类名称 AND c.depository_id = #{depositoryId} AND o.depositoryId = #{depositoryId} -- 仓库ID AND YEAR(o.time) = #{year} -- 年份 AND MONTH(o.time) = #{month} -- 月份
UNION ALL
-- 从 depository_record 表中获取记录 SELECT 'depository_record' AS source_table, d.id, d.at_id as at_id, d.mname AS name, d.model, d.quantity, d.price as unitPrice, d.quantity * d.price as totalAmount, d.apply_time AS record_date, d.apply_remark, c.title AS category_title FROM depository_record AS d JOIN categories AS c ON d.apply_remark LIKE CONCAT('%', c.title, '%') WHERE c.title = #{categoryName} -- 分类名称 AND c.depository_id = #{depositoryId} AND d.depository_id = #{depositoryId} -- 仓库ID AND YEAR(d.apply_time) = #{year} -- 年份 AND MONTH(d.apply_time) = #{month} -- 月份
